WorkItem.Description:
A did a test and unlearned all talents, removed all gear and buffs, and found out that actual vs. Rawr base attributes for Level 80 Night Elf Druid (Cat) differ. Details are below and also attached as a screenshot.
-----
Level 80 base stats: (Without any gear, talent, or buff)
 
Actual Base Str: 85
Actual Base Agi: 86
Actual Base AP: 396
 
Rawr's Base Str: 86
Rawr's Base Agi: 87
Rawr's Base AP: 399
-------
Note: Also, together with raid buffs and talents "SotF" and "Imp. MotW", the above 1 point difference becomes 2 or sometimes 3.
